en.title: FE Welcomes QP Wearers, Philippine Senate President, Manny Villar and wife, Congresswoman Cynthia Villar.
en.content:
FE's CEO Paul Ting, together with FE Leaders, Pastor Art, Judge Lorenzo, Dr Anarie, FE Spokesman Jean Daniels, UK soccer stars Ray Parlour, Lee Sharpe together with Steve Black (Owner, Masters Football International), Robert Teasdale (Owner, Masters Football Asia), Matthew Ting (CEO Totedaddy Ltd) and Maite Defonsor (former Congresswoman Quezon City) had the honour of being invited to breakfast at the home of Philippine Senate President Manny Villar and his wife Congresswoman Cynthia Villar to show their support for the "Christmas For Payatas" Charity. At the filming of the support and appeal by Senator Villar and Congresswoman Cynthia, FE's Spokesman Jean Daniel took the opportunity to demonstrate FE's QP. Needless to say both Senator Villar and Congresswoman Cynthia Villar were hugely impressed by what FE's QP can do!

FE would like to take this opportunity to thank Senator Villar and Congresswoman Cynthia for their kindness in supporting the "Christmas For Payatas" Charity. On our part, FE is highly impressed by the statesmanship, humbleness and vision of Senator Manny Villar, who was once a scavenger on the dumpsite known as Smoky Mountain and who has now risen to become one of Philippines most successful businessman, President of the Senate, President of the Nacionlista Party of Philippines and potential President of the Philippines. Senator Villar's rise to the top is truly inspirational and FE is proud to be associated with a person of such calibre!
